publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4129 Marilyn Livingstone: Congratulations to Raith Rovers Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Raith Rovers Football Club on winning the Second Division title following a 1-0 victory over Queen’s Park Football Club; commends the team as its promotion to the First Division after a four year absence; pays tribute to team manager John McGlynn and his players on their terrific achievement; acknowledges the efforts of the staff and fans in supporting Raith Rovers FC through to victory in eight of its last nine games, and commends the stability that the board of directors and volunteers have brought to the club.

S3M-4129 Congratulations to Raith Rovers Football Club (lodged on 12 May 2009) Cathy Jamieson*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Bill Butler*, Jamie McGrigor*, John Park*, Elizabeth Smith*, Jackie Baillie*, Mary Mulligan*, Jamie Hepburn*, Kenneth Gibson*, Claire Baker*
S3M-4129 Congratulations to Raith Rovers Football Club (lodged on 12 May 2009) Dr Richard Simpson*, Robin Harper*, Pauline McNeill*, Hugh Henry*
